Desc.entry: Provides seedcorn finance, business loans and equity linked finance ranging from £15k to £2m for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SME's). Businesses must be located in or planning to relocate to Yorkshire, Humber, North or North East Lincolnshire (the Yorkshire and Humber region). Offers financial packages to help businesses fill the gaps in funding they need for development or acquisition, where conventional sources of finance are insufficient or unavailable. Aims to finance ambitious entrepreneurs and businesses who can demonstrate their ability to successfully grow their businesses. Finance Yorkshire is supported financially by the European Union and has attracted £45million investment from the European Regional Development Fund (ERDF) and Yorkshire Forward and £45million match funding from the European Investment Bank.
